name: The Legend Of Zora
description:
Note: Please allow 3-5 minutes for the game to load in your browser.

NoteTheSecond: This game runs better when downloaded! Try downloading the game below for optimal performance.

Description: The Legend Of Zora is a Top-Down Brawler. You control Zora, an elvish warrior, whom must survive 10 waves of enemy onslaught. Control Zora with the 'WASD' keys and press the left and right mouse buttons to attack.
